meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Isaac Patterson Niall Prendergast Jason Keller Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6274.

td.p: Isaac Patterson, a grocer from Seattle, Washington
Niall Prendergast, a medical student originally from Norwich, Vermont
Jason Keller, a tutor from Highland Park, New Jersey (whose 4-day cash winnings total $94,800)

tr.td: A MATTER OF SOME GRAVITY
FRUITS & VEGETABLES
BEWARE OF GOD
GEORGE STRAIT TO NO. 1
"CUS" WORDS
PARDON MY FRENCH

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Jason: What is the 17th?)

the 18th century

Jason
Triple Stumper
')

$6,201
JasonWhat is Honshu?
$10,000
(1 of) Honshu or Java')
